first_translate: lady fiona,
if you were with me,

hangle: 분명 더 나은 미래를 꿈꿀 수 있을 겁니다.
first_translate: I’m certain we could dream of a better future together.

hangle: 뭐, 연서를 받는 건 나름 신선한 경험이기는 했지.
first_translate: well... receiving love letters was certainly something new for me...

hangle: 하지만 난 이미 연인이 있고, 모르는 상대에게 설렐 이유도 없다.
first_translate: but I already have someone special, so there’s no reason why I’d fall head over heels for some stranger.
my lord, please allow me to say this beforehand.

hangle: 답장을 드리지 않았던 것이 곧 거절의 뜻이었습니다.
first_translate: the fact that I didn’t reply is my way of saying “no.”
I know.

hangle: 하지만 한 번 더 긴밀한 이야기를 나누고 싶어서요.
first_translate: but I wanted us to talk more about it one last time.
let's hope our conversation doesn’t test my patience too much.
let's hope our conversation doesn’t test my patience too much.
alright then, what do you want to tell me?

hangle: 저는 영애에 대해 아주 잘 알고 있습니다.
first_translate: I know everything about you, lady fiona.
and rest assured,
it’s information different from anything others may know.
it’s information different from anything others may know.
with both of us working together,

hangle: 지금보다 훨씬 더 많은 것들을 할 수 있을 거라고 생각합니다.
first_translate: I believe we can achieve far greater things than we ever thought possible.
as I mentioned before in my letter,

hangle: 저는 영애께서 지혜로운 선택을 하시리라 믿겠습니다.
first_translate: I trust that you will make a wise decision.
honestly,

hangle: 별로 휩쓸리고 싶지 않은 유형의 인간이다.
first_translate: this isn’t exactly the kind of person I'd like to deal with.

hangle: 제가 아는 것이 무엇인지는 저와 함께 가시면 알려 드리죠.
first_translate: come with me if you wish to find out how much I really know about you.
secrets about myself...

hangle: 걸리는 것들이 많긴 하지만 이런 말에 일일이 동요할 수는 없지.
first_translate: that sounds tempting, but I don’t think I’ll take him up on his offer.
not only because I don’t need to, but also because I'm just not interested.
may I leave now?
what a shame. well, at least accept this gift as a token of goodwill.
it’s an invitation card.

hangle: 받아 두셔서 나쁠 건 없을 겁니다.
first_translate: take it. it might come in handy someday.
give it some serious consideration.

hangle: 적어도 지금 곁에 붙어 계신 황자 전하보다
first_translate: at any rate, I am definitely worthier than prince bernhart.

hangle: 분명 제가 훨씬 가치 있을 테니까요.
first_translate: at any rate, I am definitely worthier than prince bernhart.
now that you mention it, I’ve changed my mind.
does that mean you’re going--
count bill curtis.
do you even deserve to utter such words?

hangle: 그게 그 입으로 뱉는 것이 가능한 말이라고 생각하시나요?
first_translate: do you even deserve to utter such words?

hangle: 한 번만 더 황자 전하에 대해서 가치를 운운하신다면,
first_translate: if you dare speak ill of his highness again,
I promise you that I won’t let it slide next time around.
next time around.
next time around.
she wasn’t very pleasant company, was she?
that woman...
no, indeed.

hangle: 영애가 왜 그리 적대적으로 나오셨는지 이제 알 것 같아요.
first_translate: I finally understand why she reacted so hostilely toward me earlier.

hangle: 뭐, 제가 그를 싫어하는 건… 단순히 행동의 문제가 아니라,
first_translate: of course, I dislike her simply because of her behavior,

hangle: 사교계에 새로운 파벌을 만들고 있기 때문이지만요.
first_translate: but mostly due to the fact that she’s creating another faction within high society.
a faction?!

hangle: 네, 듣자 하니 무언가 비밀 클럽을 운영해서 귀족들을 부르고 있더군요.
first_translate: yes. apparently, she runs some sort of secret club where nobles are invited.
from what I heard, it seems quite suspicious.
then does that mean...
...that was an invitation to join her club?
apparently, she makes rather interesting claims.

hangle: 자기가 마물을 조종하는 방법을 알고 있다거나,
first_translate: for instance, she says she knows ways to control demonic beasts,

hangle: 어둠에 당한 이들을 구원할 수 있다는 이야기죠.
first_translate: or save those who've been consumed by darkness.

hangle: 황궁 마법사와 성녀들조차 해내지 못했던 일들이니
first_translate: even the royal mages or saints haven’t managed to accomplish these feats yet,
so they must all be lies.
save people consumed by darkness...
...and control demonic beasts?
to my surprise, many aristocrats seem to support her cause.
although personally speaking, I despise her.
wouldn’t you agree with me after today?
indeed, I would.
so...
is the reason why fiona got drunk tonight...
...because of another man?
completely wasted
as I said,

hangle: 영 별로인 남자를 만나서 영애의 기분이 상하셨거든요.
first_translate: she met a terrible guy, which put her in a bad mood.
who was he?
what happened?
well...

hangle: 그건 영애께 직접 물어보시는 게 어떨까요?
first_translate: why don’t you ask her yourself?

hangle: 아, 하지만 그렇게 술에 취한 건 황자 전하 때문이에요.
first_translate: oh, but getting drunk had nothing to do with count curtis. it was actually your fault, your highness.
how did I--?
how did I--?
well...
you should probably ask her directly.
fiona has always been strange.

hangle: 피오나가 그 여자와 놀지 않았으면 좋겠는데….
first_translate: I wish she wouldn’t hang out with that girl anymore...

hangle: 마음에 들어 하니까 어쩔 수 없나.
first_translate: but since she likes her, I suppose there’s nothing else I can do.
where have you been cheating behind my back?

while you’re seeing someone else,
